fr.sii.ogham.core.util

Class HtmlUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sii.ogham.core.util.HtmlUtils

  • public final class HtmlUtils
extends Object
    Utility class for handling HTML content. It helps for repetitive tasks for manipulating HTML.
    Author:
    Aur√©lien Baudet

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static List<String> getDistinctCssUrls(String htmlContent)
      Finds all CSS file inclusions (looks for link tags for stylesheet files).
      static List<String> getDistinctImageUrls(String htmlContent)

    • Method Detail

      • isHtml

        public static boolean isHtml(String content)
        Indicates if the provided content is HTML or not. It is considered HTML only if it is a whole document. Any partial HTML content won't be considered as HTML.
        Parameters:
        content - the content to test
        Returns:
        true if it is HTML, false otherwise

      • getDistinctCssUrls

        public static List<String> getDistinctCssUrls(String htmlContent)
        Finds all CSS file inclusions (looks for link tags for stylesheet files). Returns only the path or URL to the CSS file. If the several CSS inclusions have the same path, the path is present in the list only one time.
        Parameters:
        htmlContent - the html content that may contain external CSS files
        Returns:
        the list of found CSS inclusions (paths only) or empty if nothing found

      • getDistinctImageUrls

        public static List<String> getDistinctImageUrls(String htmlContent)
        Finds all image inclusions (looks for img tags). Returns only the path or URL to the image. If the several images have the same path, the path is present in the list only one time.
        Parameters:
        htmlContent - the html content that may contain image files
        Returns:
        the list of found images (paths only) or empty if nothing found

      • getTitle

        public static String getTitle(String htmlContent)
        Get the title of the HTML. If no title tag exists, then the title is null.
        Parameters:
        htmlContent - the HTML content that may contain a title
        Returns:
        the title of the HTML or null if none
